name: 1 Game 1 Life
description:
The evil Dr RED Mage kidnaped you, and know to escape him you have to go through all the vicious little game he has prepared for you. But be carfull ! You only have one life per game to get the highest score and break free from the prison of Dr RED Mage !

This game was made in 48h during the Jamming Assembly, by a team of 5 people including Solal, Akual, Lokyol, DonThomas and myself.
